title: Pixel 4 new assistant on g suite acc, old assistant on non gsuite account
content: I am trying to get the new Google assistant UI. I have two accounts signed into my phone, a personal non gsuite account, and a gsuite account. On the personal account, I have the old Google assistant UI, however, on the gsuite account, I have the new UI. I would like to use the new assistant on my personal account, seeing as I can't add my gsuite account to my home without restarting from scratch.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
